title: Take Me to the Cabin
description: An awkward, shy mountain man. An easy going city girl. They each hold a secret that could destroy the other...I never planned to be a runaway bride but the things I found out...Now I'm starting over in the small town of Whiskey River, Montana.Phoenix wasn't part of the plan.The shy virgin mountain man who I can't seem to stay away from.But he has secrets of his own.When the past catches up to me not even he can help me this time...This is Phoenix and Jenna's story.A Mountain Man, Runaway Bride, Billionaire, Virgin Hero Romance.
author: Kaci Rose
